referenceObject.reference: Sugawara, Y., Ihara, Y. & Nakano, T. (2021a). A new species of Cybaeus L. Koch, 1868 (Araneae, Cybaeidae) with simple genitalia from central Japan is the sister species of C. melanoparvus Kobayashi, 2006 with elongated genitalia. Zoosystematics and Evolution 97(1): 223-233.
